attributes.action: Make North post 16 supply students with skateboards/bikes/heelys/horses idk
attributes.additional_details:
The distance is not the only problem but also the hill that Redland happens to be built on. This is a big problem for students as this tends to make some late and others simply tired.
The school likes to describe redland and cotham as being close to each other but if i can’t run there in five minutes it is definitely not close so i have come up with the solution for the school to supply the students with some sort of transport so the distance between the schools aren’t as big.
attributes.background:
Students in north post 16 have been going through a few problems one of them being the distance between the two buildings. 


No one asked for this but you’re welcome in advance.

rejection.details: You could raise this with the school's senior management and/or the governing body.
